oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Quantify entanglement by concurrence hierarchy
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fan, Heng
Matsumoto, Keiji
Imai, Hiroshi
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quantum Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We define the concurrence hierarchy as d-1 independent invariants under local unitary transformations in d-level quantum system. The first one is the original concurrence defined by Wootters et al in 2-level quantum system and generalized to d-level pure quantum states case. We propose to use this concurrence hierarchy as measurement of entanglement. This measurement does not increase under local quantum operations and classical communication.
